Background.title: Background Colors
Background.description: Background colors are used to set the backdrop for various UI elements. They help in creating visual hierarchy and improving readability.

Typography.title: Typography
Typography.description: Our typography system is designed to provide clear and consistent text styles across the application. Below are the different text styles available for use.

Colors.title: Color Palette
Colors.description: Our color palette consists of primary, secondary, and neutral colors that can be used to create a cohesive and visually appealing interface.

Radii.title: Border Radius
Radii.description: Border radius values are used to create rounded corners on UI elements, enhancing the visual appeal and user experience.

Shadows.title: Box Shadows
Shadows.description: Box shadows are used to create depth and hierarchy in the UI by adding shadows to elements, making them stand out against the background.

CardExample.title: Card Example
CardExample.description: This is an example of a card that uses the background colors, typography, borders, and shadows defined in our design system.
